name: pcntl_getpriority
purpose: Get the priority of any process

return.description:
pcntl_getpriority returns the priority of the process
   or FALSE on error.  A lower numerical value causes more favorable
   scheduling.This function may
return Boolean FALSE, but may also return a non-Boolean value which
evaluates to FALSE, such as 0 or
"". Please read the section on Booleans for more
information. Use the ===
operator for testing the return value of this
function.
